column4: Hardy does come with compiz, but it depends on your graphics card
is your system running too slow or something
you could go into /etc/X11/xorg.conf and set the video driver to vesa

ok, have you done sudo apt-get install envyng?
what kind of video card do you have?
what is the major problem you are experiencing?

i can't expan my menu bar
I thought you had nvidia or ati
